verses.verse: Do we <S%G756>begin<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to <S%G4921>commend<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%>? <S%G1508>or<s%> need <S%G5535>we<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> others, <S%G1992>epistles<s%> of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> letters of <S%G4956>commendation<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%>?

Forasmuch as ye are manifestly <S%G5319>declared<s%> <S%G3754>to<s%> <S%G2075>be<s%> the <S%G1992>epistle<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1247>ministered<s%> <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G1449>written<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> with <S%G3188>ink<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> with the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of <S%G3035>stone<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4560>fleshy<s%> <S%G4109>tables<s%> of the <S%G2588>heart<s%>.

<S%G3739>Who<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> hath <S%G2427>made<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G2427>able<s%> <S%G1249>ministers<s%> of the <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G1121>letter<s%> <S%G615>killeth<s%>, <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> giveth <S%G2227>life<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G1722%G1121>written<s%> and <S%G1795>engraven<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3037>stones<s%>, <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722%G1391>glorious<s%>, <S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> stedfastly <S%G816>behold<s%> the <S%G1519%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>countenance<s%>; <S%G3588>which<s%> glory was to be done <S%G2673>away<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G2633>condemnation<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> doth the <S%G1248>ministration<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> <S%G4052>exceed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> that which was made <S%G1392>glorious<s%> had <S%G3761>no<s%> <S%G1392>glory<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3313>respect<s%>, by <S%G1752>reason<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G5235>excelleth<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> that which is done <S%G2673>away<s%> was <S%G1223%G1391>glorious<s%>, <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3123>more<s%> that which <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> is <S%G1722%G1391>glorious<s%>.
Seeing <S%G3767>then<s%> that we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, we <S%G5530>use<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> plainness of <S%G3954>speech<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G3475>Moses<s%>, which <S%G5087>put<s%> a <S%G2571>vail<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%>, <S%G4314>that<s%> the <S%G5207>children<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G816>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> stedfastly <S%G816>look<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%> of that which is <S%G2673>abolished<s%>:

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G3540>minds<s%> were <S%G4456>blinded<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> this <S%G4594>day<s%> <S%G3306>remaineth<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G2571>vail<s%> <S%G3361>untaken<s%> <S%G343>away<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> the <S%G320>reading<s%> of the <S%G3820>old<s%> <S%G1242>testament<s%>; <S%G3748>which<s%> vail is done <S%G2673>away<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.
<S%G1161>Nevertheless<s%> <S%G2259>when<s%> <S%G302>it<s%> shall <S%G1994>turn<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, the <S%G2571>vail<s%> shall be taken <S%G4014>away<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> that <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> is, <S%G1563>there<s%> is <S%G1657>liberty<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, with <S%G343>open<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> beholding as in a <S%G2734>glass<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, are <S%G3339>changed<s%> into the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>, even <S%G2509>as<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
